caption.center: Willie Earl HATTEN v. STATE of Mississippi.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Jones County; James D. Hester, J.
opinion.attorneys:
Buckley Ford, Travis Buckley, Laurel, for appellant.
A.F. Summer, Atty. Gen. by William D. Boerner and Karen Gilfoy, Sp. Asst. Attys. Gen., Jackson, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before RODGERS, P.J., and SMITH, ROBERTSON, SUGG and BROOM, JJ.
